department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: David Burns is the UX Manager at Humana.  His team is responsible for interaction design, visual design, design research, accessibility and content strategy.  Prior to joining Humana, David was the President of Transcend Innovation Group -- a social entrepreneurship focused on career education.  David previously managed the Multimedia User Interface Design team at Motorola.  His team was responsible for designing multimedia user interfaces for Motorola's core mobile device platform.  <br><br>Prior to joining Motorola, David was a managing consultant for IBM's Usability Engineering National Practice where he led user interface design efforts for several Fortune 500 companies.<br><br>David received a Bachelor of Science in computer science with a concentration in psychology from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and a Master of Engineering with a focus on user interface design and educational technology from the University of Colorado at Boulder.  <br>
